text: 734 did not observe any statisically significant difference in the OS rate or PFS rate between these patients and patients who did not receive adjuvant therapy after surgery.It should be noted that significantly increased number of patients with lesion size, parametrial invasion, deep stromal invasion, PLN involvement, and LVSI was observed in the patients treated with adjuvant therapy.
